title: ReFi Roundup [template]
html:
⚫
❗️Steps before you start writing:
- Have a look at the task brief <--
- Read some of the previous few roundups!
- Brainstorm ideas for the headline story and let the content coordinator know what you decide as soon as you can!

✅ Key KPIs:
- Aim for total length of between 1200-1500 words max.
- Focus on making a headline story that is topical, engaging, and concise (300-500 words max!)
- Get a draft to the content coordinator by the end of Thursday at the latest!

⚠️ Editor's Advice:
- All mentions of people and projects needs to link to their website or twitter profile!
- Be selective! Do not include every story you come across! However, do look at out for suggestions from the community or content coordinator!
- You don't need to include every section in this template, include the ones that work for the week!
- Use buttons for any call to action links!
- Make it graphical, fun and engaging! Emoji's are welcome 🎉

❗️Steps after writing:
- Come up with an excerpt to summerise the article and add into the metadata!
- Check links to make sure none are broken!
- Decide if you want to do the promote Roundup task
- Get feature image from Monty (high quality picture of the contributer is needed!)
